_comment_market_data: Market data provider for historical candles and price data
_comment_providers: Available providers: market_data: kucoin, binance, binance_us, coinbase, coingecko | trading: robinhood, binance, binance_us, coinbase
_comment_binance: For Binance, set environment variables: BINANCE_API_KEY, BINANCE_API_SECRET, BINANCE_USE_US=true/false
_comment_coinbase: For Coinbase, set environment variables: COINBASE_API_KEY, COINBASE_API_SECRET
